room_title: Escape room "Voodoo Spirits" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
room_description: There is a "Loa" – a Haitian Vodou ghost also called "the Invisible" – haunting the hut of a priest where you have been trapped by this evil spirit... The priest has a powerful golden skull that can protect you against Loa possession. You must find it within an hour before the spirit enters you.
